363320.name: Void Destroyer - Mini Sandbox
363320.description:
Void Destroyer - Mini Sandbox is a proof of concept - of the planned sequel to Void Destroyer - released for fans to enjoy, give feedback and generate ideas.

While the "mini sandbox" has a lot of common sandbox features - it lacks the intended depth/polish of a full release and many planned features of Void Destroyer 2.

For these and other reasons this DLC is free to owners of Void Destroyer.

Features:

  • Start with a small fighter - work your way up in the universe
  • Expand your fleet with wingmen
  • Complete missions for factions
  • Collect bounties on pirates
  • Purchase resources for trade - or steal them from cargo ships
  • Persistent and living (though minimal) open sandbox
  • Estimated 5 hours of play time

I hope you enjoy getting a sneak peek at a sandbox experience in the Void Destroyer universe.
363320.supported_languages:
英语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
